name: 曾恕銘
objective:
This course covers the basics and latest developments in information and communication technology (ICT), including Part I multimedia communications and networks, and Part II Introduction to Generative AI
本課程涵蓋資訊和通訊技術（ICT）的基礎知識和最新發展，包括第一部分多媒體通訊和網路，第二部分介紹生成人工智慧
schedule:
Part I multimedia communications and networks
1.  Network Protocols (Internet engineering)
2. IT  source coding for video standards (Huffman code etc.)
3. Information theory and channel coding introduction
4. Convolutional/RS codes for 4G control channel
6. LDPC codes/Polar codes for 5G
7. Multiple access protocols in layer 2 (CSMA/CA with RTS/CTS for Wi-Fi etc.)
8. Error resilience in wireless video transmission(HARQ(RCPC+CRC), MDC, Cross-layer control, optimization theory (including linear programming))
Part II Introduction to Generative AI
9. Generative AI universal
10.  prompt engineering
11 LLMtraining
12 T in ChatGPT transformer intro
13 Generative AI generationstrategy
14 Image Generation in Generative AI
